{{cpp/experimental/fs/title|operator/{{small|(std::experimental::filesystem::path)}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl|since=fs_ts|1=
path operator/( const path&amp; lhs, const path&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

接合两个路径。相当于返回 {{c|1=path(lhs) /= rhs}}。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|要接合的路径}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
路径接合的结果。

===异常===
{{unreviewed noexcept}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::experimental::filesystem;

int main()
{
    fs::path p1 = "C:Users";
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "\"C:\" / \"Users\" == " &lt;&lt; p1 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    fs::path p2 = "batman";
    fs::path p3 = p1 / p2; // inserts fs::path::preferred_separator, '\' on Windows
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "\"C:\" / \"Users\" / \"batman\" == " &lt;&lt; p3 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
"C:" / "Users" == "C:Users"
"C:" / "Users" / "batman" == "C:Users\batman"
}}
